game.name: Gachi Heroes
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, RPG, 시뮬레이션
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Gachi Heroes is a game about the dark fantasies. That's amazing an endlass journey in which you will know yourself with your favorite gachimuchi characters. How deep would you go?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Gachi Heroes is a game about the dark fantasies. That's amazing an endlass journey in which you will know yourself with your favorite gachimuchi characters. How deep would you go?

reviewHighlights.text: 냄새나는 남자 엉덩이랑 불활 졸라 치는 개씹뵨태 겜입니다 평시가 1100원인데 할인할때 사세요 꼭이요
